eg

Class EditAreaFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.EditAreaFormat

  • public class EditAreaFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    The formatting (word wrap, font, display of line numbers) for EditArea objects.

    The font is applied to all objects, whereas wordwrap and the visibility line numbers is applied to the currently viewed editor

    The initial parameters are given by entries in the prefs file.

      void applySetWinOk()
      Applies the selection in the ViewSettingWin to show or hide line numbers

      Changes the wordwrap state of the EditArea selected by setCurrEditArea(int)
      EditArea createEditArea()
      Returns a new EditArea that is initialized with the current settings
      void setCurrEditArea(int index)
      Selects an element from this array of EditArea and selects/unselects the wordwrap menu item depending on the state of that element
      void setEditAreaArr(EditArea[] editArea)
      Sets the array of type EditArea
